amendment.description: Amendment increases and then decreases funding for the National Park Service by $1 million in order to address updating PEPC to make it available in Spanish as well as English.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and then decrease the National Park Service by 1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Gallego.
